alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...SEVERAL STRONG THUNDERSTORMS LIFTING NORTHEAST ACROSS THE CHILLY AND MACKAY REGION HEADING TOWARD LEMHI COUNTY... At 323 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms from 11 miles northwest of Chilly Barton Flat to near Mackay. Movement was northeast at 10 to 15 MPH. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 MPH and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mackay, Mackay Reservoir, Darlington, Chilly Barton Flat, Willow Creek Summit, Summit Reservoir, Clyde, Lone Pine and Mt Borah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify and become severe, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for portions of central and southeast Idaho.
